event.name: AA_TEST_FIGHT
event.text: A slip-tunnel opens up nearby, and a massive Zoltan ship painted in caution stripes peeks out. "We will bring you a fight to remember... but only if you know what to pick."
"Your choice has been made." A brightly-colored Rebel Rigger swings in front of your sensors as the Zoltan vessel jumps away.

event.name: AA_TEST_FIGHT_TEST
event.text: You receive a single hail from the ship as it turns to face you. "Let's dance!"

event.name: AA_TEST_FIGHT_BOSS
event.text: "I see you are eager to begin. Who do you desire to stare down?"

choice.text: I want to face a Rebel Cruiser.

event.text: "Your choice has been made." A hail quickly arrives, and you turn your ship around to find yourself nearly brushing up against a massive Rebel Cruiser!

"Your choice has been made." A second slip-tunnel opens up alongside the Zoltan ship as it backs away into its own, revealing a massive, green Auto-ship holding a 39-foot-long paper in one of its scrap arms.

event.name: AA_TEST_FIGHT_RENEGADE
event.text: "I see you are eager to begin. Who do you desire to stare down?"

choice.text: I want to face the White Knight.

event.text: "Your choice has been made." A second slip-tunnel opens behind you, and a strangely-painted Stealth Cruiser rockets past your port window.

choice.text: I want to face Le Camaraderie.

event.text: "Your choice has been made." A second slip-tunnel opens in front of you, and an ornate Paladin Cruiser approaches menacingly.

choice.text: I want to face the TSS-Bonnie-24.

event.text: "Your choice has been made." A second slip-tunnel opens to your side, and a horribly worn cruiser formerly belonging to the Tony's retail chain appears before you.

choice.text: I want to face the Manifestation of Will.

event.text: "Your choice has been made." Your systems begin to glitch out, flashing strange scenes of white environments populated with gratuitous violence.

event.name: AA_TEST_FIGHT_BOSS_REBEL_CRUISER
event.text: "Wait... where am I? Oh, god damn it, it's the Feds! Battle stations, everyone!"

event.name: AA_TEST_FIGHT_RENEGADE_STEALTH
event.text: The strange ship hails you, revealing a tall man at the helm bearing graying hair, red eyes, and a script. "So, you're the testing ship we've heard about? Well, let's waste no further time. How hard should we go?"
"Alright. Battle stations, men!"
"Alright. Battle stations, men!"
"Alright. Battle stations, men!"
Both of you hear a disturbing laugh from behind you, and the strange captain shifts his stance. "Alright. Battle stations, men! Let's not go easy on them..."
"Alright. Battle stations, men! Let's not go easy on them..."

event.name: AA_TEST_FIGHT_RENEGADE_PALADIN
event.text: A Rockman Crusader wearing a thick trenchcoat appears on the viewscreen. He grunts, looking down as a Crystal Liberator awaits your verdict.
A deep, gravelly voice sounds out from the Rockman. "So be it!"
A deep, gravelly voice sounds out from the Rockman. "So be it!"
A deep, gravelly voice sounds out from the Rockman. "So be it!"
Both of you hear a disturbing laugh from behind you, and the Rockman turns to face you, staring deep into your eyes. "So be it! This'll be a real pain..."
A deep, gravelly voice sounds out from the Rockman. "So be it! This will be a pain..."

event.name: AA_TEST_FIGHT_RENEGADE_TONY
event.text: A brown-haired human dressed in a purple guard outfit stares unnervingly into your eyes over the viewscreen. "Agh, it seems the law has finally caught up with me..."
The figure brandishes his knife, before the communication ends. You register a teleporter signal!
The figure brandishes his knife, before the communication ends. You register a teleporter signal!
The figure brandishes his knife, before the communication ends. You register a teleporter signal!
A disturbing laugh sounds out inside your head as the figure brandishes his knife. You register a teleporter signal, and he winks before dematerializing!
The figure brandishes his knife. You register a teleporter signal, and he winks before dematerializing!

event.text: "Uh, I think I got the script... Rehearsal in 3... 2... 1...!"
